description: Get a list of states for given country

response_fields.name: states
response_fields.description: List of states in given country

requests.curl:

	-H "Api-Version: v1" \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJ3d3cuYmV0YS1tYWxpbWFydHYuZWxhc3RpY2JlYW5zdGFsay5jb20iLCJpYXQiOjE1OTE1Njc2ODkuODU4NjQ3MywidXNlciI6eyJpZCI6MSwibG9naW4iOiJkb2N0b3IyMzUud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwiZW1haWwiOiJkb2N0b3IyMzUud2hvQGV4YW1wbGUuY29tIiwib3JpZ2luIjoibG9jYWwiLCJwcmVtaXVtIjpmYWxzZX0sImV4cCI6MTU5MTY1NDA4OX0.gnuTXA03TZ2caC4e79jgk5IiUxigjGbuC3s4Ei9UynoXnZ7luqqMHVe9nIduCVSpHND4mWJK6BlbatNw6pbLEA"
